reviews.review_msg: As nice as she is, I wouldn't rec Eline. Gives unclear grading criteria and gives worse clarification when asked. Difficult to access outside of class time. Lectures, readings, and course outline all seem very disconnected and only tangentially related. Sucks, cuz I was excited about this class and it ended up being a psych class :/ reading heavy

Brian seems like a nice guy and I like how he incorporated real events into lectures and assignments. However, his slides are very dense and his lecture style is tough to follow as he likes to ramble and offten mumbles to himself.

Worst prof I've ever had. incoherent lectures, abandons thoughts half way through speech so hard to take notes. text dense unclear slides. forgot to tell school he wanted a final exam so it wasn't on the exam schedule and he instead announced it 3 weeks before end of term. Assignment prompts are unclear with 5 run on sentences in a row.

Michael is a great prof who is passionate about what he is speaking about. Lectures were not boring and super engaging. He did his best to make assignments fun and not just a regular research paper. Weekly readings were actually nice to read and not boring. He did a great job of making the course entertaining.

Mike is the BEST. Lectures were engaging and the assigned readings were fantastic (I actually wanted to read them)! Super caring/understanding and wants his students to succeed. He made political theory super interesting and incorporated pop culture in assignments, which were really fun and not typical/boring. Couldn't recommend more!!
One of the best profs I had

Mike is awesome! Absolutely amazing. The course contained so many interesting readings and discussions. Hes a pretty chill guy and a super fair marker. Dont understand why he doesnt have a higher rating. Take him if you can!
The theorists were not political theorists, they were more on social constructionism.

Judging by all the misspellings and false course codes and details listed below, this seems to be one bitter and vindictive little individual trying to tank Mike's rating. Clearly someone thought they deserved to do better than they actually did in a class. Nobody cares about your redundant and poorly expressed thoughts. Have fun.
I think Michael forgot to realize that he is teaching Political Science, not Gender Identity.

I would highly recommend this professor to anyone. He understands theory and how to lecture it to his students. Very generous with marking and wants everyone to excel in life. He also encourages class discussions. If anyone hasn't taken him, then take him before you graduate.

super passionate about the course content. readings were so interesting but sometimes long (all online, no fee). fair marker but doesn't really give you feedback on your papers/exams unless you ask. 1st half of lec was usually summarizing the readings/going over assignment expectations, 2nd half usually watching a movie/doc. chill guy overall
He genuinely cares about the content of the course. He's a very wholesome prof that wants to make lectures enjoyable while also connecting it to recent political events.
Michael is really knowledgeable and clear in his teaching. He is also really nice, would take him again in a flash.

The best professor in the world. He is very generous with the marking, he cares deeply about his students, loves teaching history also, and is a very caring person. The best professor in the Poli Sci department. They love him!!!! If you take him, you'll never regret it 100%.
